title: WhatsApp for iOS readying the ability to hide  ‘Last Seen’ status from specific contacts
content:
Six months ago, WhatsApp started to implement another privacy setting for its users with a new option to hide your “Last Seen” status from specific contacts. The company is now rolling out this feature for beta testers. Here’s what you need to know.

more…

The post WhatsApp for iOS readying the ability to hide ‘Last Seen’ status from specific contacts appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: WhatsApp is working on the ability to hide your "Last Seen" status from specific contacts. Here's what you need to know about it.
